QuestData.Title: Elementary, My Dear Drakonid
QuestData.Description:
Grimtusk wants to take another crack at Frostbite, eh? I hate to turn him down, but I left that life behind for the life of a scholar.
I'm trying to uncover the history--and make history. But I'm stumped by this esoteric riddle here in these ancient ruins.
The riddle is this: if you touch a nearby crystal, it says "follow the pattern." But I haven't the faintest idea what that means!
Tell you what. If you can help me crack this riddle, I'll go help Grimtusk finish Frostbite off once and for all.
QuestData.LogDescription: Help Varsek solve the mystery of the Ancient Outlook.
QuestData.RewardText: Oh dear... I'm not going to lie, $n, this isn't my proudest moment.
